summary: This is an internal DOJ email forwarding a Daily Mail article about a secret meeting between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June. It appears to be a press monitoring communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: Mentioned in a forwarded Daily Mail article about having a secret meeting with Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned in a forwarded Daily Mail article about having a secret meeting with Prince Andrew in London in June.

connections.description: Reported to have had a secret meeting together in London in June, as per the Daily Mail article.

events.title: Secret London meeting between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A secret meeting reportedly took place between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in London.

events.title: Daily Mail article publication and internal DOJ forwarding
events.description: The Daily Mail publishes an article about the secret meeting, and it is forwarded internally within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: A Daily Mail article reported a secret meeting between Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in London in June.
The article was forwarded internally within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on November 21, 2019.
This indicates ongoing press monitoring by the DOJ regarding figures connected to the Epstein case.
